tool_description: Secure JSON API for 145+ World Currencies
name: fastFOREX
title: fastFOREX

api_list.name: /currencies
api_list.description: Fetch a list of supported currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fastforex.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastforex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fastforex.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastforex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /fetch-all

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Base currency 3-letter symbol, defaults to USD

api_list.name: /fetch-one
api_list.description: Fetch a single currency exchange rate

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Base currency 3-letter symbol, defaults to USD

api_list.name: /fetch-multi
api_list.description: Fetch multiple currency rates at once

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Target currencies, comma separated list of 3-letter symbols

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Base currency 3-letter symbol, defaults to USD

api_list.name: /convert
api_list.description: Convert an amount of one currency into another currency

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: Amount of source currency to convert

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Base currency 3-letter symbol, defaults to USD
